entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
